        public void dismissAll()
        Cleans up the current ongoing alerts.

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss​(GeoFenceMonitor monitor)
        Removes a monitor from the alerting mechanism. If it the monitor has any ongoing alerts they are cleaned up and removed.

      • dismiss

        public boolean dismiss​(GeoFenceMonitor monitor,
                       boolean bStopMonitoring)
        Dismiss the alerts for specified monitor, optionally quit monitoring those alerts/items
        Parameters:
        monitor - the monitor to use
        bStopMonitoring - if the monitor also needs to stop monitoring
        Returns:
        true if we quit monitoring, and it was the last item being monitored

      • dismiss

        public boolean dismiss​(GeoFenceMonitor monitor,
                       GeoFenceAlerting.Alert alert,
                       boolean bStopMonitoring)
        Dismiss a specific alert for a given monitor
        Parameters:
        monitor - Monitor
        alert - Alert
        bStopMonitoring - True to stop monitoring the alert's item
        Returns:
        True if there are no more items being monitored

      • dismiss

        public boolean dismiss​(GeoFenceMonitor monitor,
                       PointMapItem item,
                       boolean bStopMonitoring)
        Dismiss the alert, optionally quit monitoring
        Parameters:
        monitor - the monitor associated with the alert.
        item - the item associated with the alert
        bStopMonitoring - if the monitoring should stop when the alert is dismissed
        Returns:
        true if we quit monitoring, and it was the last item being monitored

      • getAlerts

        public java.util.List<GeoFenceAlerting.Alert> getAlerts​(java.lang.String mapItemUID)
        Get list of ongoing alerts for monitor associated with the specified Shape Map Item UID
        Parameters:
        mapItemUID - find an ongoing alert for a specific map item.
        Returns:
        the list of alerts for a map item.
